title: Preparation of Data Hub - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: In order to use Data Hub, you must first install Cloudera Manager and Cloudera Data Platform (CDP), which includes Impala and HDFS. Once the installation is complete, prepare the database by creating a staging directory and the destination tables. This chapter includes the following sections: Preparing the Database Installing Cloudera Manager and Cloudera Data Platform
